channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: Covid-19 live: Waikato's Mangatangi School a location of interest ahead of alert level decision
item.description: Tests have found a link between three Waikato Covid-19 cases - including two students - and the Auckland outbreak, as ministers meet to decide if alert levels are moving.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: Covid-19: Cabinet could make ‘cautious' alert level decision to extend Auckland lockdown, adding Waikato, expert says
item.description: Professor Michael Baker says Cabinet might take the cautious approach to extend Auckland's lockdown for another week and add parts of the Waikato after household members of a remand prisoner tested positive in the region — including a pupil who was symptomatic at school.
item.dc:creator: COLLETTE DEVLIN

item.title: Covid-19 NZ: Auckland lockdown alert level decision to be announced at 4pm
item.description: Cabinet faces its toughest call on Covid-19 yet as it decides whether or not to take Auckland out of lockdown.
item.dc:creator: HENRY COOKE

item.title: Family living off-grid on exposed Wellington hilltop invite others to do the same
item.description: The Lubich-Sparagna family love their exposed, off-grid lifestyle high above Wellington - and they're looking for new neighbours.
item.dc:creator: COLLEEN HAWKES

item.title: Planned balloon release for victims of triple murder raises environmentalists' concerns
item.description: After an outcry from environmentalists, over an intended balloon release in memory of the three Dickason girls, it has been swapped for a flower float.
item.dc:creator: ESTHER ASHBY-COVENTRY

item.title: Fire crews tackle blaze at warehouse in Auckland's Mt Wellington
item.description: Fourteen fire appliances are at the scene of the fire at a warehouse in the suburb of Mt Wellington.
item.dc:creator: LUCY XIA AND MINA KERR-LAZENBY

item.title: Photographer takes first steps three months after helicopter crash
item.description: A photographer seriously injured in a wedding day helicopter crash says she hopes to reunite with the couple and document their second wedding day on their first anniversary.
item.dc:creator: ELLIE JAY OF RNZ

item.title: Face mask exemptions ignored in their hundreds due to 'lack of awareness'
item.description: A man with PTSD after being sexually abused says he was kicked out of a Wellington mall for not wearing a mask despite showing his exemption.
item.dc:creator: TOM HUNT

item.title: One person dead after truck crash in Broadwood, Far North
item.description: A truck is believed to have rolled, killing one person, on Broadwood Rd in the Far North's Broadwood.
item.dc:creator: DANIELLE CLENT

item.title: Cycling siblings to represent New Zealand at Road World Championships in Belgium
item.description: Niamh and Finn Fisher-Black would compete against each other for their dad’s wheel when they were kids. Next week they will compete at the World Championships.
item.dc:creator: PHILLIP ROLLO

item.title: Covid-19: 'It's like Groundhog Day all over again' - Hauraki health provider back on Delta search
item.description: These testers were on the ground when Covid threatened Coromandel in August. Now they're on the front lines once more.
item.dc:creator: SCOTT YEOMAN

item.title: Summerset granted consent for its 35th village, a $150m development in Cambridge, Waikato
item.description: Big operator Summerset has been consented for its 35th retirement village.
item.dc:creator: MARTA STEEMAN

item.title: Covid-19: Auckland mayor pushes for level 3 move now almost 80% of residents are jabbed
item.description: With almost 80 per cent of the city vaccinated with a first dose, Phil Goff is calling for a move to alert level 3 amid mounting pressures on residents.
item.dc:creator: LUCY XIA

item.title: Scott Dixon's IndyCar title hopes over
item.description: Frustrating season continues for defending champion who struggles in penultimate race in California.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Covid-19: Mangatangi School is Waikato location of interest in Delta outbreak
item.description: Alongside Mangatangi School, a number of supermarkets, a health centre and a gas station in Auckland are among the latest locations of interest.
item.dc:creator: MINA KERR-LAZENBY

item.title: November and December MIQ spots gone in 67 minutes, thousands miss out
item.description: “I don’t want Christmas this year,” says crying mother, as all hope of a managed isolation spot for her son this year evaporates.
item.dc:creator: TOM HUNT

item.title: Bar's licence at risk after patrons found playing beer pong on pool table
item.description: Drinking games, one-way door policy breaches, and a duty manager working 14 hours a day came to light during inspections at Mo’s Sports Bar in Gisborne.
item.dc:creator: MARTY SHARPE

item.title: Boult, Milne on fire but Mumbai Indians lose to Chennai Super Kings as IPL resumes
item.description: The Black Caps seam duo made an instant impact as the IPL resumed in the UAE, but their efforts were for nought in the end.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Mangatangi School dad: 'Officials seem to have dropped the ball'
item.description: Father-of-two who lives a few clicks south of Auckland's Covid-19 border is annoyed that officials appear to have exposed his community to Delta.
item.dc:creator: JO LINES-MACKENZIE

item.title: Dua Lipa announces New Zealand tour for 2022
item.description: The English singer-songwriter - one of the biggest artists in the world right now - is heading Down Under to play one show on our shores next year.
item.dc:creator: DAVID SKIPWITH
